title: Asana Pricing | Personal, Starter, Advanced, & Enterprise plans â€¢ Asana
content: Pick the plan that fits your team Personal For one or two people managing personal projects. Free forever Manage tasks and personal to-dos: 2 users 2 users Unlimited tasks Unlimited tasks Unlimited projects Unlimited projects Unlimited messages Unlimited messages Activity logs Activity logs Unlimited storage, 100MB max per file Unlimited storage, 100MB max per file List, board, and calendar views List, board, and calendar views Basic search filters Basic search filters Status updates Status updates iOS and Android mobile apps iOS and Android mobile apps Time tracking with integrations - Learn more Time tracking with integrations - Learn more 100+ free integrations with your favorite apps - Learn more 100+ free integrations with your favorite apps - Learn more Starter For growing teams that need to track their projects' progress and hit deadlines. Per user, per month billed annually. US$13.49 billed monthly Everything in Personal, plus: Asana AI Asana AI AI Studio (with additional credits for purchase) AI Studio (with additional credits for purchase) No user seat limits No user seat limits Timeline and Gantt view Timeline and Gantt view Workflow builder Workflow builder Project dashboards Project dashboards Universal reporting Universal reporting Advanced search Advanced search Custom fields Custom fields Forms Forms Unlimited automations Unlimited automations Start dates and times Start dates and times Custom project templates Custom project templates Admin console Admin console Private teams and projects Private teams and projects Unlimited free guests Unlimited free guests Advanced For companies that need to manage a portfolio of work and goals across departments. Per user, per month billed annually. US$30.49 billed monthly Everything in Starter, plus: Asana AI Asana AI AI Studio (with additional credits for purchase) AI Studio (with additional credits for purchase) Goals Goals Unlimited portfolios Unlimited portfolios Portfolio workload Portfolio workload Integrations with Salesforce, Tableau, and Power BI Integrations with Salesforce, Tableau, and Power BI Forms branching and customization Forms branching and customization Approvals Approvals Proofing Proofing Lock custom fields Lock custom fields Native time tracking Native time tracking Scaled security Scaled security Enterprise For companies that need to coordinate and automate complex work across departments, without limits. description: Explore Asana's flexible pricing plans and find the right solution to help your team stay organized, connected, and on track.
